verses.roman:
kathaṁ rāmam asambhrāntaṁ
jitvājeyaṁ surāsuraiḥ
śālvenālpīyasā nītaḥ
pitā me balavān vidhiḥ

synonyms: katham—how; rāmam—Lord Balarāma; asambhrāntam—never confused; jitvā—defeating; ajeyam—undefeatable; sura—by demigods; asuraiḥ—and demons; śālvena—by Śālva; alpīyasā—very small; nītaḥ—taken; pitā—father; me—My; bala-vān—powerful; vidhiḥ—fate.
translation: [Lord Kṛṣṇa said:] Balarāma is ever vigilant, and no demigod or demon can defeat Him. So how could this insignificant Śālva defeat Him and abduct My father? Indeed, fate is all-powerful!
